items.title: avoidwork/woodland: Lightweight HTTP framework with automatic headers

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable React Native SDK for integrating the iPay payment gateway. Supports multiple payment channels like Mpesa, Airtel, and credit cards, with secure hash generation, configurable callbacks, and seamless toggling of payment options.
items.title: thisgirlElan/iPay-payment-gateway: A lightweight and customizable React Native SDK for integrating the iPay payment gateway. Supports multiple payment channels like Mpesa, Airtel, and credit cards, with secure hash generation, configurable callbacks, and seamless toggling of payment options.

items.content_html: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
items.title: heyloura/lillihub-client: Lillihub is a simple, lightweight micro.blog web client with a light/dark mode and responsive design. It is built using Deno, HTML, CSS, and a sprinkle of vanilla JavaScript. It is delightfully usable without JavaScript being enabled.
